name: .HWAV File Extension
summary: Learn about .HWAV files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open HWAV files with 3hs. To use an HWAV file with 3hs, place it in the following directory on your Nintendo 3DS's SD card (after installing 3hs):
Then, launch 3hs, and you can play the file by selecting Music from the app's menu bar.
